content: the heartstring trims are a part of my series of patterns that use my breakaway crochet method the trims use a brand new technique for working continuous motifs so no long chains no sewing and no yarn tails two styles of heart-shaped motifs can be mixed and matched to make a variety of projects they can be worked with just about any kind of yarn and can be sewn to items as a trim used as a border or incorporated into stand alone projects smaller projects are great for using leftover bits of yarn please follow me on instagram lisawiddy to see interesting ideas on how to use the trims watch the pattern tutorials here 1 i also recommend that you learn the basic techniques required to work these trims by reading the training wheels project ebook 2 or watching the quick start tutorial 3 and you will also need to understand the concepts presented in the 2-round motif video tutorial 4 for more information check out my breakaway crochet facebook page 5 1 https //youtube com/playlist list=pllclwvvpmp8kut6yucxq1gmfhrzt-h9er 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/breakaway-training-wheels 3 https //youtu be/zd5audj0mkq 4 https //youtu be/a_ojwyjv0zy 5 https //www facebook com/breakawaycrochet/
